name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Muinzhiniyara wa Sofuthiwee
summary: Mubveledzi wa Software a re na tshenzhemo, a tshi ṱoḓa tshikhala tshiswa tsha u shuma kha phurojeke khulwane. U vha na dzangalelo ḽa u sika kana u engedza khoudu uri vhaṅwe vha kone u i shumisa. Ndi tenda uri vhukoni hanga ndi vhuṱuku musi ndi tshi vhambedza na inthanethe, ngauralo ndi na dzangalelo ḽihulwane ḽa u shuma na zwiṅwe zwishumiswa, tshumelo, nyambo dza u phurogirema.

education.school: Yunivesithi ya Muvhuso wa California ya Fullerton

experience.title: Muinzhiniyara wa Sofuthiwee
responsibilities: U fhaṱa na u shumisa tshumiso dza webusaithi dzine dza nga linganiswa hu tshi shumiswa React na Node.js .
Ro shumisana na vhalanguli vha zwibveledzwa u khwinisa ṱhoḓea na u vhona uri zwi ḓiswa nga tshifhinga
Vho bveledza na u ṱhogomela RESTful APIs dza tshumiso dza webusaithi
Ho bveledzwa maṅwalo a u ḓiitela mishumo na u khwinisa vhukoni

experience.title: Muthusi wa Mugudisi wa Thenisi
responsibilities: U funza thekhinikha dza thenisi kha tshigwada tsha vhatambi vha 5-10
U ita uri ngudo i takadze na u takadza vhatambi
U vha na vhudifhinduleli ha tsireledzo ya vhatambi vha re khothe, nga maanda vhatambi vhatuku na vhahulwane, sa vhatambi vha minwaha ya 3 na vha minwaha ya 60

experience.title: Mufarisani wa nnḓa
responsibilities: U dzhia oda dza vharengi vha inthanethe
U paka oda dza u rumela
U hwala oda kha malori a u isa zwithu
U thusa vharengi u wana zwithu vhengeleni
U dzudza vhupo ha u vhulungela zwithu ho kuna nahone ho dzudzanyea
U vhulunga vhupo ho tsireledzeaho na vhukonani kha vharengi na vhashumi .

projects.name: Phothifoḽio
projects.description: Webusaithi ine ya fhindula i sumbedzaho phurojeke na zwikili hu tshi shumiswa thekinoḽodzhi dza musalauno dza webusaithi .
